name: Andrew Burks
body:
# Courses
### CS 398: Undergraduate Design/Research (Data Visualization)
### CS 401: Computer Algorithms
### CS 424: Visualization and Visual Analytics
### CS 425: Computer Graphics I
### CS 426: Video Game Design
### CS 526: Computer Graphics II 
- *Topic:* Interactive Scientific Visualization

# Research
- ## NSF Research Experiences for Undergraduates
    - Data Visualization

- ## [**SAGE2**: Scalable Amplified Group Environment](http://sage2.sagecommons.org/)

# Skills
- Languages:
    - Javascript, Java, C/C++, HTML, CSS, SQL

- Libraries/APIs:
    - D3.js, Node.js, Three.js, WebSocket, Leaflet.js, REST, SODA, OpenGL 

# Projects
### CS 424
- Project 1: **Style**: [(Repo)](https://github.com/AndrewTBurks/CS424-Project1) [(Live)](https://andrewtburks.github.io/CS424-Project1/): Visualizing interesting outfits I saw over the course of 2 weeks.
- Project 2: **Exoplanet Visualization**: [(Repo)](https://github.com/ijedi1234/CS424_Project2) [(Live)](https://ijedi1234.github.io/CS424_Project2/): An "InfoVis" approach to visualizing the exoplanet database.
- Project 3: **Visualizing Dynamic Influence Networks**: [(Live)](https://andrewtburks.github.io/Cab-Data/): Visualizing time-series dynamic influence networks for biological rule-based simulations.  

### CS 526
- 2016 VGTC Data Contest - Honorable Mention: 
    - [IEEE VPG](http://vacommunity.org/ieeevpg/viscontest/2016/entries/3.html)  
    - [EVL](https://www.evl.uic.edu/entry.php?id=2231) 
- **CabViz** [(Live)](https://andrewtburks.github.io/Cab-Data): Visualizing Origin-Destination format data with Leaflet.

# Publications

### Conference Papers
D. McNamara, J. Tapia, C. Ma, T. Luciani, __A. Burks__, J. Trelles, and G. E. Marai. **Spatial Analysis of Employee Safety Using Organizable Event Quiltmaps.** In *Proceedings of the IEEE VIS 2016 Workshop on Temporal & Sequential Event Analysis,* Baltimore, MD, USA, October 2016. ([pdf](https://eventevent.github.io/papers/EVENT_2016_paper_22.pdf))

### Contact
